name: Human Torch

abilities.name: Fireball
abilities.details: Shoots fireballs that apply a burn effect. Generates Heat.

abilities.name: Flame On! (Flight)
abilities.details: Engulfs himself in flame, allowing flight. Consumes Heat rapidly.

abilities.name: Nova Burst
abilities.details: Releases a powerful burst of heat and flame. Requires high Heat level.

abilities.name: Heat Vent
abilities.details: Rapidly vents built-up Heat, allowing for longer flight or more ability usage.

ultimate.name: Maximum Heat
ultimate.effect: Fires a sustained, powerful beam of fire. Generates massive Heat.
ultimate.details: Unleashes his maximum fiery power in a concentrated beam.

passives.name: Heat Management
passives.details: Abilities generate Heat. Overheating reduces damage output temporarily. Heat dissipates over time or via Heat Vent.

teamups.effect: Nova Burst cooldown reduced when near FF members.

lore: Johnny Storm gained his powers after exposure to cosmic rays during a space mission. He can engulf his body in flames, fly, absorb heat, and control fire.
